Description

No visual/audio feedback when copying password to clipboard.
Steps to Reproduce

    Generate a password.

    Click the "Copy" button.

Expected vs Actual

    Expected: Confirmation toast/notification.

    Actual: No feedback provided.

Environment

    OS: iOS 16

    Browser: Safari

Attachments

Copy Feedback
